codeSystems.name: AircraftFumeExposureValueSet
codeSystems.title: Health Impacts of Aircraft Fume Exposure
codeSystems.description: ValueSet for SNOMED concepts related to health impacts from exposure to aircraft contaminated air and fume events.

codeSystems.name: Astronaut_Back_Pain
codeSystems.title: Back Pain and Space Travel Research Concepts
codeSystems.description: SNOMED codes related to back pain and associated conditions observed in astronauts and their potential terrestrial applications.

codeSystems.name: GimbalContraindicatedConditions
codeSystems.title: Gimbal Contraindications
codeSystems.description: Contraindicated conditions for riding a multi-axis gimbal

codeSystems.name: LunarDustToxicityValueSet
codeSystems.title: Lunar Dust Toxicity Related Conditions
codeSystems.description: A ValueSet containing SNOMED codes for conditions and effects associated with lunar dust exposure, including respiratory, ocular, and systemic toxicities.

codeSystems.name: Muscle_Stiffness_and_Space_Health
codeSystems.title: Muscle Stiffness and Space Health ValueSet
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet includes SNOMED codes related to muscle stiffness and health in the context of spaceflight and Earth-based applications, filtered by a similarity threshold greater than 0.5.

codeSystems.name: SleepLossHypoxiaEffect
codeSystems.title: Sleep Loss and Hypoxia Effects ValueSet
codeSystems.description: This ValueSet includes SNOMED CT terms matched to concepts related to the physiological and cognitive effects of sleep loss and hypoxia.

codeSystems.name: SleepLossHypoxiaResponses
codeSystems.title: Sleep Loss and Hypoxia Responses
codeSystems.description: A ValueSet for concepts related to sleep deprivation and physiological/cognitive responses to systemic environmental hypoxia, including associated medical conditions and factors.

codeSystems.name: Space_Adaptation_Bone_Health
codeSystems.title: Adaptations of Bone Health in Space
codeSystems.description: SNOMED CT concepts related to bone health adaptations observed in spaceflight conditions.

codeSystems.name: SpaceRadiationRisksVS
codeSystems.title: Space Radiation Risks ValueSet
codeSystems.description: A ValueSet containing SNOMED concepts relevant to space radiation risks and associated health concerns identified from Artemis I mission data.

codeSystems.name: SpaceTravelBrainChanges
codeSystems.title: Brain Changes from Prolonged Space Travel
codeSystems.description: A ValueSet encompassing SNOMED concepts related to physiological and neurological changes from prolonged space travel.

codeSystems.name: SpaceflightStressFactors
codeSystems.title: Stress and Physiological Factors in Spaceflight Analog Missions
codeSystems.description: Concepts related to stress, physiological, and psychological factors during spaceflight analog missions.
